summary: TypeError: (0 , ms_1.default) is not a function error when starting a worker due to incompatible ms package version 3.0.0-canary.1. The issue was resolved by using a proper canary release or clearing npm cache.
userImpact: Users cannot start workers due to runtime TypeError caused by an incompatible transitive dependency version.
rootCause: The ms package version 3.0.0-canary.1 has an incompatible export structure where the default export is not a function, breaking the msWithValidation utility.
proposedFix: Use ms version 2.1.3 or update to a proper canary release (3.0.0-canary.202508261828+). Force package manager to query NPM registry with --prefer-online flag.
workaround: Run npm i --prefer-online (NPM), pnpm install --prefer-online (PNPM), yarn install --update-checksums (Yarn Classic), or yarn install --check-cache (Yarn Berry/3+) to clear cache and install correct version.
resolutionDetails: Resolved by upstream ms package releasing proper canary versions and users clearing npm cache to fetch correct dependency versions.
keyQuote: we're shaking the dust off after many years without a release. if you still want to depend on the canary you can use the release linked here
